title: DataStax Aims To Simplify Building AI Apps With RAGStack
author: Loraine Lawson
description: In April, DataStax acquired Langflow, an open source tool for RAG. It's now part of a tech stack that helps developers build AI applications.
cntitle: DataStax 旨在通过 RAGStack 简化 AI 应用的构建
cndescription: 4 月，DataStax 收购了 Langflow，一个用于 RAG 的开源工具。它现在是帮助开发人员构建 AI 应用程序的技术栈的一部分。
